channel.title: Comments on: September Top 10 – The month’s most inspiring designs

item.title: By: Ben Bush
item.dc:creator: Ben Bush
item.description: Eight Hour Day and Struckaxiom do it for me. Great looking sites.
item.content:encoded: Eight Hour Day and Struckaxiom do it for me. Great looking sites.

item.title: By: Juliane
item.dc:creator: Juliane
item.description: These look very inviting. Since we are assaulted all the time with awful looking websites, It's nice to see a group of well designed pages all together. The pink octopus drawing on the first page at the top is my favorite. wall art
item.content:encoded:
These look very inviting. Since we are assaulted all the time with awful looking websites, It’s nice to see a group of well designed pages all together. The pink octopus drawing on the first page at the top is my favorite.
wall art

item.title: By: R Brill - Web Design Bristol
item.dc:creator: R Brill - Web Design Bristol
item.description: Loving some of these, very 'cutting edge'. Its nice to see a few websites which are well designed and are not a design business in themselves.
item.content:encoded: Loving some of these, very ‘cutting edge’. Its nice to see a few websites which are well designed and are not a design business in themselves.
